resources.string: Androidify was born out of the spirit of the Android operating system - a system that let’s anyone make, build, offer or buy all sorts of things, but in a way that helps all those things work together. Even the Android mascot is open source… so, go ahead… use Androidify to turn the little green mascot into your own creation.
Check out what other people from around the world have created.

While there are more than 1,490,248,844,407,008,000 clothing and accessory combinations (thats a quintillion, btw), there’s a good chance weve forgotten something. Let us know - were always working to make androidify better!
Learn more about all the stuff that’s being created using the Android operating system (phones, tablets, cars, TVs and more).
Still have a question? Check out our Androidify FAQ page or <a href=com.google.android.apps.androidify://licenses>tap here to learn about licensing</>.
Androidify is a collaboration between Google Creative Lab and Larva Labs. If you want to geek out, check out the open source code behind Androidify.
Check out this Android character. Make your own at Androidify.com or get the free app on Google Play
Create your own Android character in your favorite NBA team gear at Androidify.com or get the app on Google Play #androidifyNBA
Design your own Android character in your favorite NBA team jerseys at Androidify.com or get the app on Google Play #androidifyNBA
NBA jerseys are now in the new Androidify! Go to Androidify.com or get the app on Google Play #androidifyNBA
Check out this Android character. Make your own at Androidify.com

Your Android could be seen by the world on a giant billboard.
Your Android will get to hang out with others from around the world at Androidify.com.
Your Android might appear in the new Android advertising campaign on TV or on YouTube.

I am 13+ years old, and from planet Earth. I am cool with my Android character, its name and a location of my choosing being displayed publicly in the Gallery at Androidify.com and possibly in the new Android advertising campaign. I accept the <a href=https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/>privacy policy</> and the <a href=https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/terms/>terms of service</>.
